snippet: Rising bond yields spurred more debate over when the Federal Reserve would start to taper its economic stimulus program.
abstract: Stock market drifts mostly lower after rising bond yields spur more debate over when the Federal Reserve will start to taper its economic stimulus program.
lead_paragraph: Rising bond yields spurred more debate over when the Federal Reserve would start to taper its economic stimulus program.

headline.main: Talk That Fed Will Ease Its Stimulus Cools Markets
headline.print_headline: Talk That Fed Will Ease Its Stimulus Cools Markets
